text: Pangali chakanya pa jwangalola, pangali chakanya soni pa jwannemale, pangali chakanya soni pa jwakulwala, kapena soni pa mwachimisyene kuti n’dyeje m’majumba mwenu, kapena m’majumba ga achatati wenu, kapena m’majumba ga achachikulu wenu, kapena m’majumba ga achachimwene wenu, kapena m’majumba ga achachemwali wenu, kapena m’majumba ga achibaba wenu wanandi kapena wakulungwa, kapena m’majumba ga achibaba wenu wachikongwe, kapena m’majumba ga achin’jomba wenu, kapena m’majumba ga achimama wenu wanandi kapena wakulungwa, kapena wamwasunjile makiyi gao, kapena ajenu. Pangali chakanya pa jenumanja kuti n’dyeje nganya kapena jikajika. Sano pati nchijinjilaga m’majumba, basi peleganani salamu mwachimisyene (pakuwecheta kuti: As-Salam ‘Alaikum – Ntendele uwe kukwenu) chilamuchilo chakuumila kwa Allah chachili chaupile soni chambone. Iyyoyopeyo Allah akusalichisya kukwenu ma Aya kuti jenumanja mmanyilile
